description: Create a romantic home page with a warm, cozy aesthetic. Include a hero section with a sweet intro about a couple's love story. Design should feel like a digital scrapbook - soft colors (pastels or warm tones), smooth animations, and subtle heart motifs integrated tastefully throughout (floating hearts, heart-shaped dividers, or subtle patterns). The intro should be warm and genuine, blending romance with shared gaming memories. Add a beautiful call-to-action inviting visitors to explore their story. Make it mobile-friendly with gentle fade-in animations. The overall vibe should be nostalgic, intimate, and aesthetic - like opening a cherished love letter.

Add an 'Our Story' timeline section below the hero. Create a vertical timeline with milestones showing how the couple met and key moments in their relationship. Include dates/timeframes and descriptions for events like 'First Match', 'First Voice Call', 'Became Official', 'First IRL Meeting', 'Our Adventures'. Design should have a romantic aesthetic with connecting lines, subtle heart markers, and smooth scroll animations. Use the same warm color palette. Make it feel like flipping through a scrapbook of memories.

Add a photo gallery section for Roblox screenshots and memories. Create a beautiful grid or masonry-style gallery with placeholder images (use image generation or placeholder service). Each image should have hover effects and space for captions. Include a romantic heading like 'Our Gaming Adventures' or 'Pixelated Memories'. Design should feel cohesive with the rest of the page - warm tones, smooth animations, heart motifs. Gallery should be responsive and work beautifully on mobile.

Replace the placeholder gallery images with the user's actual Roblox screenshots. Copy these 6 images to the public folder: /home/user/Attachments/31fc7f40-697c-47e2-98ff-bdc9525d9403.jpeg, /home/user/Attachments/90f8d236-efb5-4410-9698-60e723f79dd3.jpeg, /home/user/Attachments/8eb8a845-2fc5-4bfa-a083-ce813a7c5db9.jpeg, /home/user/Attachments/60deb0a5-7dc5-4016-b45a-942375cfd7bc.jpeg, /home/user/Attachments/f7dda9f1-7e82-41da-9599-bdbeef2211aa.jpeg, /home/user/Attachments/b8c2a3fb-6446-480a-ad2d-9a77350ee643.jpeg. Update the gallery section to display these real Roblox screenshots instead of placeholders. The captions can be romantic and playful about their gaming memories together.

Update the timeline with Alpha and PRi's real relationship milestones: 1) First Match - Mid-November 2025 (when they met in Roblox), 2) Started Dating - November 23, 2025, 3) First Voice Call - Around November 30, 2025 (a week after dating), 4) Epic 2v16 Game War - Their legendary battle together, 5) Got Engaged - January 9, 2026 (last week), 6) First IRL Meeting - Planned for August 2026. Update descriptions to reflect their actual story - meeting in Roblox, falling in love through gaming, and their upcoming in-person meeting.

Personalize the entire site with their names Alpha and PRi. Update the hero intro section to reference them by name. Make the copy feel authentic to their story - a Roblox love story that started with gaming and grew into an engagement. Keep the warm, romantic tone but make it specific to their journey.

Update the timeline with corrected dates: 1) First Match - Mid-October 2025 (when they first met in Roblox, 6 weeks before dating), 2) Started Hanging Out - Late October 2025 (4 weeks of dates/getting to know each other), 3) Became Official - November 23, 2025, 4) First Voice Call - Around November 30, 2025 (a week after dating), 5) Epic 2v16 Game War - December 2025, 6) Got Engaged - January 9, 2026, 7) First IRL Meeting - August 2026 (planned). Adjust the descriptions to reflect this more accurate timeline.

Transform the gallery section into clickable cards that link to individual memory pages. Each of the 6 photos should link to its own dedicated page where Alpha and PRi can write detailed stories and memories. Create pages for: 'Our First Adventure', 'Making Memories', 'Side by Side', 'Late Night Exploring', 'Our Happy Place', and 'Every Moment'. Each page should have the full-size photo, a romantic header, and a large text area where they can write their personal story about that moment. Add a back button to return to the home page. Keep the same warm aesthetic throughout.

Add navigation between the memory pages so they can browse through all their stories easily. Include prev/next buttons on each memory page to move between the 6 memories in sequence. This creates a scrapbook-like experience where you can flip through their story.

Apply text content changes: At src/web/pages/index.tsx:258 change 'Alpha & PRi' to 'Our Love Story'. At src/web/pages/index.tsx:265 change 'It started with a random Roblox match in October 2025' to 'It started with a random Roblox match in November 2025'. At src/web/pages/index.tsx:279 change 'This is our story—a digital scrapbook' to 'This is our story a digital scrapbook'.

Update the timeline to correctly show First Match in November 2025 instead of Mid-October. Adjust the 'Started Hanging Out' milestone timing accordingly to fit between the November first match and the November 23rd official dating start.

Create a dedicated 'How We Met' story page where Alpha and PRi can write the detailed story of their first meeting. Add a navigation link from the home page (maybe a button in the hero section or after the timeline). The page should have a romantic header, space for a long-form story with multiple paragraphs, and maintain the same warm aesthetic. Include a section for them to write about that first November 2025 Roblox match - how they connected, what game they were playing, first impressions, etc. Add a back button to return home.

Replace the placeholder story on the 'How We Met' page with Alpha's real, detailed story about how they met in 2 Player Hugs RP. The story is deeply personal and emotional - starting from March 2025 when he was empty and bored, finding the game, fighting the BR Team, being betrayed, training alone, becoming the strongest, then noticing PRi in November. Key moments: her calm presence, the 8-bit crown that caught his attention, 4 weeks of watching before finally speaking to her about the crown, becoming friends naturally without her knowing about his fighter reputation. The story should be formatted beautifully with proper paragraph breaks, emphasis on key phrases, and maintain the raw, honest tone. Add the image at /home/user/Attachments/b45256f2-6f73-4853-9370-45101c0a004b.png showing PRi's character with the crown and elegant outfit he described.

Update the page header and subtitle to better reflect the depth of their story. Change the subtitle from 'November 2025 — The match that changed everything' to something like 'March to November 2025 — From emptiness to finding her'. Make the layout accommodate the longer, more narrative story format with better typography and spacing for reading.

Apply text content changes at src/web/pages/how-we-met.tsx:322: Change 'From March, when I was nothing but anger and loneliness, to November, when I finally found someone who saw the real me—it was a journey I never expected to take.' to 'From March, when I was nothing but anger and loneliness, to November, when I finally found someone who saw the real me.it was a journey I never expected to take.'

Apply text content changes at src/web/pages/how-we-met.tsx:314: Change 'We became friends naturally. No big dramatic moment—just conversations that got longer, nights that got later, jokes that became inside references. She filled a space I didn't even know was empty.' to 'We became friends naturally. No big dramatic moment just conversations that got longer, nights that got later, jokes that became inside references. She filled a space I didn't even know was empty.'

Apply text content changes at src/web/pages/how-we-met.tsx:295: Change 'She didn't know I was the strongest player in the game. She didn't know my reputation, my history, any of it. And honestly? That's what made it special.She liked me for me—not for who I was in the fighting community, not for what I could do. Just me.' to 'She didn't know I was the strongest player in the game. She didn't know my reputation, my history, any of it. And honestly? That's what made it special.She liked me for me not for who I was in the fighting community, not for what I could do. Just me.'

Apply text content changes at src/web/pages/how-we-met.tsx:281: Change 'I don't even remember exactly what I said. Something about the crown. I just asked about it—where she got it, why she wore it. Something simple. Something safe.' to 'I don't even remember exactly what I said. Something about the crown. I just asked about it where she got it, why she wore it. Something simple. Something safe.'

Apply text content changes at src/web/pages/how-we-met.tsx:248: Change 'For four weeks, I didn't say a word to her. I just... watched. Not in a weird way—I just noticed her. Every time she was in a server, I'd see her. I'd notice the way she played, the way she carried herself. She never got involved in the drama. She was just there, doing her own thing, being peaceful.' to 'For four weeks, I didn't say a word to her. I just... watched. Not in a weird way I just noticed her. Every time she was in a server, I'd see her. I'd notice the way she played, the way she carried herself. She never got involved in the drama. She was just there, doing her own thing, being peaceful.'

Apply text content changes at src/web/pages/how-we-met.tsx:206: Change 'And then I noticed the crown. This little 8-bit crown sitting on her avatar. Something about it just... caught me. It was simple, but elegant. Like her whole aesthetic—this beautiful outfit, put together with actual thought and care. She stood out without even trying.' to 'And then I noticed the crown. This little 8-bit crown sitting on her avatar. Something about it just... caught me. It was simple, but elegant. Like her whole aesthetic.this beautiful outfit, put together with actual thought and care. She stood out without even trying.'

Apply text content changes at src/web/pages/how-we-met.tsx:197: Change 'There was something different about her. While everyone else was chaotic, loud, always trying to prove something—she was calm. Quiet. She moved through the server with this graceful energy that made me stop and actually look.' to 'There was something different about her. While everyone else was chaotic, loud, always trying to prove something she was calm. Quiet. She moved through the server with this graceful energy that made me stop and actually look.'

Apply text content changes at src/web/pages/how-we-met.tsx:184: Change 'November 2025. I noticed someone new in the game. Not new to the game itself—she'd been around—but new to me.' to 'November 2025. I noticed someone new in the game. Not new to the game itself she'd been around but new to me.'

Apply text content changes at src/web/pages/how-we-met.tsx:157: Change 'The people I trusted, the ones I fought alongside—they betrayed me. Left me behind. Sided with the very players we were supposed to be fighting against. I was alone again, but this time it hit different. Harder.' to 'The people I trusted, the ones I fought alongside they betrayed me. Left me behind. Sided with the very players we were supposed to be fighting against. I was alone again, but this time it hit different. Harder.'

Apply text content changes at src/web/pages/how-we-met.tsx:134: Change 'So I fought. And I kept fighting. I found a crew, we trained together, we pushed back. For a while, it felt like I had something—a purpose, friends who had my back.' to 'So I fought. And I kept fighting. I found a crew, we trained together, we pushed back. For a while, it felt like I had something a purpose, friends who had my back.'

Apply text content changes at src/web/pages/how-we-met.tsx:126: Change 'I didn't think much of it at first. But something about the competitive side of the game pulled me in. There was this group—the BR Team—dominating everyone, picking fights, making the game hell for regular players. And I decided I was going to stop them.' to 'I didn't think much of it at first. But something about the competitive side of the game pulled me in. There was this group the BR Team dominating everyone, picking fights, making the game hell for regular players And I decided I was going to stop them.'
Apply text content changes at src/web/pages/how-we-met.tsx:191: Change 'PRi.' to 'PRiViLEDGE'

Create a new 'Chapter Two: Enemies Don't Fall in Love Easily' page with Alpha's continuation of their story. The chapter covers: adding each other after the crown conversation, Alpha noticing PRiViLEDGE was connected to his enemies, removing her out of fear/paranoia, meeting again randomly and apologizing, her revealing she didn't know about the drama, the slow rebuild of trust through greetings and playful interactions, enemies trying to separate them, the fake girlfriend incident, growing jealousy and feelings, people spreading rumors, her trusting him anyway, and gradually choosing each other despite being on opposite sides. Format with the same beautiful typography and emotional depth as Chapter One. Maintain the raw, honest voice.

Add navigation between Chapter One (How We Met) and Chapter Two. Include next/previous buttons so users can read through their story chronologically. Add a link from the home page to explore their full story chapters. Create a cohesive story navigation experience.

Create a new 'Chapter Three: The Moment I Knew' page continuing Alpha and PRiViLEDGE's story. This chapter covers: the fragile state of their friendship, her jealous friends trying to pull them apart, the pivotal moment when her friend protected her instead of Alpha, his jealous reaction and pushing her away, asking how she felt about the friend, her revealing she was about to delete him, Alpha realizing he loved her, spending more time together, November 23 at midnight - the confession where they both said they wouldn't e-date then did it anyway, starting to date quietly and secretly, and acknowledging this was just the beginning of the real adventure. Maintain the same emotional depth, beautiful typography, and warm aesthetic as Chapters One and Two.

Update the chapter navigation system to include Chapter Three. Add next button from Chapter Two to Chapter Three, previous button from Chapter Three to Chapter Two. Add a 'Chapter Three 💕' link on the home page hero section alongside the other chapter buttons. Update routing in app.tsx. Create a seamless reading experience across all three chapters.

Update the section in Chapter Three where Alpha asks PRiViLEDGE how she feels about her friend. Change it to show the real, more powerful answer: She told him that she saw how jealous he was, and she was so afraid of losing Alpha that she was about to delete the entire game to choose him. She wasn't just deleting a friend - she was willing to leave the game completely for Alpha. This shows the depth of her feelings and commitment. Make this moment hit harder emotionally - this was when he truly knew how much he mattered to her.

Apply text content changes at src/web/pages/chapter-three.tsx:264: Change 'She was so afraid of losing me that she was about to delete the entire game.' to 'She was so afraid of losing me that she was about to delete that person from friends.'

Apply text content changes at src/web/pages/chapter-three.tsx:270: Change 'Not just me. Not just our friendship. The whole game. Everything. She was willing to leave it all behind—the friends, the memories, the world we'd built—just to choose me. To prove she wanted me.' to 'Not just me. Not just our friendship. The whole game. Everything. She was willing to leave it all behind the friends, the memories, the world we'd built just to choose me. To prove she wanted me.'

Apply text content changes at src/web/pages/chapter-three.tsx:278: Change 'That's when I understood. This wasn't just some online friendship. This wasn't just flirting or games or passing time. She was ready to walk away from everything—for me. She was choosing me before I even asked her to.' to 'That's when I understood. This wasn't just some online friendship. This wasn't just flirting or games or passing time. She was ready to walk away from everything for me. She was choosing me before I even asked her to.'

Create a new 'Chapter Four: When Love Turned Into War' page continuing the story. This chapter covers: the sweet early days of their relationship, Alpha reigniting conflict with the BR Team out of boredom before the relationship, how she changed him from fighter to lover, the pivotal moment when a BR Team member grabbed her, Alpha stepping in to protect her, the legendary 2v16 battle where she stayed and fought beside him for hours, ex-friends betraying him by helping the BR Team because he chose her, forming a new loyal team with his duo Luxx, defeating the BR Team and becoming the strongest players and couple, and the decision to make their love real by telling their families and facing the world outside the screen. Maintain the same emotional depth, beautiful typography, and aesthetic as the previous chapters.

Update the chapter navigation to include Chapter Four. Add next button from Chapter Three to Chapter Four, previous button from Chapter Four to Chapter Three. Add a 'Chapter Four ⚔️' link on the home page hero section. Update routing. Also update the timeline on the home page to include the Epic 2v16 War milestone with more specific context now that the full story is told.

Create the final 'Chapter Five: The Battle That Became Us' page. This chapter is the conclusion that brings everything together: reflecting on how every fight and betrayal in Roblox were lessons preparing them for real life, the fear and beauty of telling their families, getting engaged quietly and simply with a promise to protect and choose each other every day, realizing the game trained them for life (patience, courage, loyalty), memories of the 2v16 battle and her never running, how she sees everything he fought for in her (trust, loyalty, kindness, strength), acknowledging future challenges will come but knowing they can fight together, and the ongoing journey of choosing each other every single day. This is the emotional culmination - from game to real life, from battles to forever. Maintain the same beautiful aesthetic and emotional depth.

Complete the chapter navigation system. Add next button from Chapter Four to Chapter Five, add Chapter Five as the final chapter (no next button needed). Add 'Chapter Five 💍' link on the home page. Update routing. Consider adding a special visual treatment to Chapter Five since it's the conclusion - maybe a different subtitle or closing message that emphasizes this is their ongoing story.

Create 'Chapter Six: When Pixels Become Reality' page - an upcoming/future chapter about their first IRL meeting planned for August 2026. Since this hasn't happened yet, write it as anticipatory and hopeful - their dreams, fears, excitement about finally meeting in person after all the online battles and love. Include: the nervous excitement of planning, what it means to go from avatars to face-to-face, fears about whether it will feel the same, confidence that it will be even better, counting down the days, imagining the first hug, the first time holding hands, seeing each other's real smiles, and the beginning of their physical journey together. Mark this chapter clearly as 'UPCOMING - August 2026' in the subtitle. Keep the same emotional depth but in future/anticipatory tone.

Add Chapter Six to the navigation system. Add next button from Chapter Five to Chapter Six with special styling to indicate it's upcoming/future. Add 'Chapter Six ✈️ (Coming August 2026)' link on the home page with distinct styling to show it's the future chapter. Update routing. Make it visually clear this chapter is about what's to come, not what has happened.
Apply text content changes at src/web/pages/index.tsx:119: Change 'Early November 2025' to 'Mid-October 2025'
Apply text content changes at src/web/pages/memory.tsx:135: Change 'Our Memory' to 'Our Memory -How We Met and Started Our Adventure'

Apply text content changes at src/web/pages/memory.tsx:141: Change 'Write your story here... What made this moment special? What were you feeling? What do you remember most about this adventure together?' to 'This screenshot shows the moment everything began. We met in the game, joked a little, and fought together. I didn't know it then, but that was the start of something real our adventure together.'
Apply image source changes at src/web/pages/memory.tsx:116: Change source from 'https://7129-ix9wjnd1lxiv3hfruar36.e2b.app/memory/roblox1.jpeg' to '/@website-editor/images/95aaa8fbb336.jpeg'

Transform the 6 gallery memory cards to represent Alpha and PRiViLEDGE's journey chronologically from when they met to now. Update the titles and structure to reflect: 1) October 2025 - First Match (when they met, the crown), 2) November Early - Getting to Know You (4 weeks of hanging out, the removal and reunion), 3) November 23 - We Became Official (the midnight confession), 4) December 2025 - The 2v16 War (standing together against enemies), 5) January 9, 2026 - Engaged (the proposal and promise), 6) January 2026 - Our Future (planning August meeting, building their life). Update captions and prepare each memory page for them to add their personal stories and photos for each month/milestone.

Improve the date badge styling on all memory cards in the gallery. Make the badges bigger with higher contrast - increase font size, add stronger background color with better opacity, make the text bolder and more readable. The badges should stand out more prominently on the cards so dates are immediately visible.

Add a new 7th memory for February 2026 to capture mid-winter moments between the engagement and the August meeting. This represents the ongoing journey, daily life together, deepening love, and building their future. Update the gallery grid to accommodate 7 memories instead of 6. Create a new memory page for February 2026 where they can add stories about this current time in their relationship.

Update each memory page to support multiple photo uploads and detailed stories. Add a photo gallery section on each memory page where multiple images can be displayed (2-4 images per memory). Add a larger story/writing section with better formatting for longer text. Update the memories data structure to support an array of images instead of just one, and longer story text. Make each memory page feel like a mini scrapbook entry with space for multiple photos and detailed written memories about that specific time period.

Create a system where Alpha and PRiViLEDGE can easily add their photos and stories. For now, set up placeholder sections in each memory that clearly show where images and stories will go. Add helpful text like 'Add your photos here' and 'Write your story here' so they know they can provide images and text to be added. Make it visually clear which memory they're editing and what content is needed.

Apply text content changes at src/web/pages/index.tsx:281: Change 'It started with a random Roblox match in November 2025. Alpha and PRi, two strangers from different places, connected by pixels and late-night gaming sessions. What began as "one more round" turned into hours of laughter, secrets shared at 2 AM, and a love neither of us saw coming.' to 'It started with a random Roblox match in November 2025. Alpha and PRiViLEDGE, two strangers from different places, connected by Roblox and late-night gaming sessions. What began as "one more round" turned into hours of laughter, secrets shared at 2 AM, and a love neither of us saw coming.'

Update the October 2025 - First Match memory with the reference image at /tmp/website-editor-images/eaad8c001337.jpeg. This image shows Alpha and PRiViLEDGE in their darker outfits with wings and effects, with the 'I love my boyfr' sign. Copy this image to the public folder and update the October 2025 memory data to use this image as the main photo for that memory.

Update the November 2025 - Getting to Know You memory with the reference image at /tmp/website-editor-images/5b4759580abb.jpeg. This image shows a playful moment with 'Cuter than alpha' text and them hugging with effects. Copy this image to the public folder and update the November 2025 memory data to use this as the main photo.

Update the December 2025 - The 2v16 War memory with the reference image at /tmp/website-editor-images/6ae11c3f0a56.jpeg. This image shows them in red/demon outfits with the 'I love my boyfriend' sign, representing their battle-ready stance during the war. Copy this image to the public folder and update the December 2025 memory data to use this as the main photo.

Update the January 9, 2026 - Engaged memory with the reference image at /tmp/website-editor-images/a8977ff64d92.jpeg. This beautiful engagement image shows 'Muahh Muahh' text with hearts, 'HEARTS4ALPHA' and 'I love my gf' sign - perfect for the engagement moment. Copy this image to the public folder and update the January 9 memory data.

Update the January 2026 - August 2026 Our Future memory with the reference image at /tmp/website-editor-images/597c25a15d9e.jpeg. This image shows them in matching dark outfits with 'I love MY GF' sign, representing their ongoing journey together. Copy this image to the public folder and update the Our Future memory data.

Update the February 2026 - Mid-Winter Love memory with the reference image at /tmp/website-editor-images/2f5ff153d2cc.jpeg. This beautiful close-up shows them together with health bar and hearts, capturing the intimacy of their current relationship. Copy this image to the public folder and update the February 2026 memory data.

Write romantic story content for each of the 7 memories based on the chapters. Extract the key moments and emotions from Chapters 1-5 and adapt them into personal, heartfelt story paragraphs for each memory:

1. October 2025 - First Match: Write about the emptiness before meeting, finding the game, noticing her calm presence, the 8-bit crown that caught his attention, four weeks of watching her from afar, finally speaking to her about the crown.

2. November 2025 - Getting to Know You: Write about adding each other, becoming friends, the fear about her being connected to enemies, removing her, the chance reunion, her revealing she didn't know about the drama, rebuilding trust through playful interactions.

3. November 23, 2025 - We Became Official: Write about the jealousy moment, asking how she felt, her choosing him over the game, realizing he loved her, the midnight confession where they both said they wouldn't e-date then did anyway.

4. December 2025 - The 2v16 War: Write about the moment someone grabbed her, stepping in to protect her, the legendary 16v2 battle where she never ran, fighting together for hours, betrayals by old friends, forming a new team, winning the war together.

5. January 9, 2026 - Engaged: Write about telling their families, the fear and beauty of making it real, the quiet proposal and promise to protect and choose each other every day, realizing the game trained them for life.

6. January 2026 - Our Future: Write about being engaged, planning the August meeting, counting down days, the anticipation of finally meeting in person, building their forever.

7. February 2026 - Mid-Winter Love: Write about their current life as an engaged couple, daily moments together, deepening love, the journey continuing.

Make each story 2-3 paragraphs, deeply romantic and personal, maintaining Alpha's authentic voice from the chapters.
